br.com.stone.posandroid.hal.api.printer

Class Printer

  • br.com.stone.posandroid.hal.api.printer.Printer

  • public class Printer

    This class represents the device's printer feature.

    • Method Detail

      • hasPrinterSupport

        public boolean hasPrinterSupport()

        This method verifies that the device has printer support.

        Returns:
        True to support, false to not support.

      • print

        public void print(@NotNull
                  PrinterBuffer printerBuffer,
                  @NotNull
                  PrintCallback printCallback)

        This method calls the printer hardware. Please, check printerBuffer for more details of objects to be printed Attention! any size restriction or limitation of Manufacturer's SDK must be handled by this method's implementation

        Parameters:
        printerBuffer - Specified in PrinterBuffer.
        printCallback - Specified in PrintCallback.

      • getStepsToCut

        public int getStepsToCut()
        Returns:
        Number of steps needed to printer cut.

      • getStepsForMillimeter

        public int getStepsForMillimeter()
        Returns:
        Number of steps in one millimeter.

      • getPrintWidth

        public int getPrintWidth()
        Returns:
        Print Width limit in pixels.

      • setPrinterDarkness

        public int setPrinterDarkness(@NotNull
                              DarknessLevel darkness)

        This method set the darkness level of the printer.

        Returns:
        0 if operation was successful, -1 otherwise
